key.name: initiate-key
key.description: Key shortcut to initiate fire drawing.

key.name: initiate-button
key.description: Mouse button shortcut to initiate fire drawing.

key.name: clear-key
key.description: Key shortcut to remove all fire particles.

key.name: clear-button
key.description: Mouse button shortcut to remove all fire particles.

key.name: bg-brightness
key.description: The brightness of the background during Firepaint (in percent). (0.0 - 100.0)

key.name: fire-size
key.description: The size of the individual particles. (0.1 - 40)

key.name: fire-slowdown
key.description: The slowdown of the fire particles. (0.1 - 10)

key.name: fire-life
key.description: The lifespan of the fire particles. (0.1 - 0.95)

key.name: fire-color
key.description: The color and opacity of the fire particles.

key.name: fire-mystical
key.description: Have random colors for the fire effect, also known as Mystical Fire.
